sites.title: iQOO Neo 6 Price in India in 2025, Full Specs, and Features
sites.content:
The iQOO Neo 6 has landed in India, bringing a powerful processor, a long-lasting battery, and a versatile camera system at an attractive price point. This offering from iQOO, known for its high-performance 5G mobile phones, caters to users who prioritise smooth gameplay and value for money.

The iQOO Neo 6 packs a punch with a capable processor that can handle even demanding games without breaking a sweat. This processing power is complemented by ample RAM to ensure smooth multitasking and background processes, letting you switch between games and apps seamlessly.

This iQOO 5G phone does not compromise on visuals either. It features a crisp display with a high refresh rate, ideal for gamers who demand a responsive and immersive experience.

The iQOO Neo 6 is equipped with a versatile camera system that lets you capture stunning photos and videos. The high-resolution main sensor and additional lenses offer flexibility for various shooting scenarios, while features like night mode ensure great results even in low-light conditions.

Powering this feature-rich phone is a long-lasting battery that will see you through extended gaming sessions and everyday use. You can focus on conquering opponents or catching up on the latest shows without worrying about running out of juice.

The iQOO Neo 6 strikes a perfect balance between performance and affordability. The starting price for the base variant with 8GB of RAM and 128GB of storage is Rs. 24,999, making it an attractive option for budget-minded gamers (price may vary depending on retailer and storage option).

You can explore the details and prices of this mobile phone on Bajaj Mall. You can also visit one of 1.5 lakh Bajaj Finserv partner stores across 4,000+ cities in India. Shop on Easy EMIs using the Bajaj Finserv financing options, which has benefits like zero down payment and free home delivery on select products.

Read more: iQOO mobile phones

iQOO Neo 6 mobile - Key specs

The iQOO Neo 6 boasts a 120Hz AMOLED display, a powerful Snapdragon 870 processor, and a triple camera setup led by a 64MP main sensor. Its 4700mAh battery supports 80W fast charging for quick power-ups, while the device offers impressive gaming performance with features like liquid cooling and a high touch sampling rate.

Spec Description Display 6.62-inch AMOLED Processor Qualcomm Snapdragon 870 5G Mobile Platform RAM Up to 12GB LPDDR5 Storage 128GB or 256GB UFS 3.1 Rear camera Triple-camera system: 64MP (main) + 8MP (ultrawide) + 2MP (macro) Front camera 16MP Battery 4700mAh Fast charging 80W FlashCharge Operating system Android 12 Release status Released



iQOO Neo 6 mobile - Full specifications and features

The iQOO Neo 6 boasts a 6.62-inch 120Hz AMOLED display, powered by the Snapdragon 870 chipset paired with 8GB or 12GB RAM. It houses a triple camera setup led by a 64MP main sensor and a 4700mAh battery supporting 80W fast charging. The device runs on Android 12-based Funtouch OS and offers features like a vapor chamber cooling system for optimal performance.

General

iQOO Neo 6 is a mid-range smartphone offering impressive performance with its Snapdragon 870 chipset and a smooth 120Hz AMOLED display. Packed with a capable camera system and fast charging, it delivers a solid overall experience. While not a flagship, the Neo 6 excels in providing a balance of features and performance for users seeking a reliable and efficient device.

Brand iQOO Model Neo 6 Price in India Rs. 28,999 Release date 31st May 2022 Launched in India Yes Form factor Touchscreen Dimensions (mm) 163.00 x 76.16 x 8.54 Weight (g) 190.00 Battery capacity (mAh) 4700 Fast charging Proprietary Colours Cyber Rage, Dark Nova



Also check: AI smartphones

Body

The iQOO Neo 6 boasts a sleek and ergonomic design with a flat display and a comfortable grip. Its back panel, crafted with premium materials, offers a stylish aesthetic while providing durability. The phone's overall build quality is solid, ensuring a sturdy and reliable device for everyday use.

Dimensions 163 x 76.2 x 8.5 mm (6.42 x 3.00 x 0.33 in) Weight 190 g (6.70 oz) Build Glass front, plastic frame, plastic back SIM Dual SIM (Nano-SIM, dual stand-by)



Also check: Big screen mobile phones

Software

The iQOO Neo 6 runs on Funtouch OS 12 based on Android 12, offering a smooth and feature-rich user interface. It boasts a dedicated gaming chip for enhanced performance and optimised gameplay, along with various customisation options to tailor the phone's look and feel to your preferences.

Spec Description Operating System Android 12



Also check: Android 16

Camera

The iQOO Neo 6 boasts a triple camera setup led by a capable 64MP primary sensor with OIS for steady shots. This is accompanied by an ultrawide lens for broader perspectives and a macro lens for close-up details. While the primary camera delivers impressive results in good lighting, low-light performance could be better. Selfies are handled by a decent 16MP front camera.

Spec Description Rear camera Triple-camera system: 64MP (main) + 8MP (ultrawide) + 2MP (macro) Front camera 16MP



Also check: Camera phones

Battery

The iQOO Neo 6 packs a 4700mAh battery that supports 80W FlashCharge technology. This combination allows for impressively fast charging, with a 50% charge achievable in just 12 minutes and a full charge in under 32 minutes. While the battery capacity might seem average, the rapid charging capabilities ensure you spend minimal time plugged in.

Spec Description Battery capacity 4700mAh Fast charging 80W FlashCharge



Also check: 5000 mAh battery phones

Hardware

The iQOO Neo 6 packs a powerful punch with a Snapdragon 870 processor ensuring smooth performance. Its 6.62-inch AMOLED display offers vibrant visuals, while the 4700mAh battery with 80W fast charging keeps you powered up. The triple camera setup led by a 64MP main sensor captures detailed shots, and ample RAM and storage options cater to multitasking needs.

Spec Description Processor Qualcomm Snapdragon 870 5G Mobile Platform RAM Up to 12GB LPDDR5 Storage 128GB or 256GB UFS 3.1 Expandable storage Not Expandable SIM type Dual SIM SIM size Nano SIM



Also check: 12GB RAM mobile phones

Display

The iQOO Neo 6 boasts a 6.62-inch E4 AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate, delivering vibrant colors, deep blacks, and smooth visuals. Its 1200Hz instant touch sampling rate ensures lightning-fast response times, perfect for gaming enthusiasts.

Spec Description Display size 6.62-inch Display type AMOLED Refresh rate 120Hz



Also check: Curved display mobile phones

Warranty

The iQOO Neo 6 comes with a standard one-year warranty for the device itself, covering manufacturing defects. The battery typically has the same warranty, while accessories like the charger and earphones usually have a six-month warranty. It is essential to retain your purchase proof to avail warranty services from authorised iQOO service centers.

Spec Description Brand Warranty 1 year



Network connectivity

The iQOO Neo 6 offers robust connectivity with support for 5G networks, ensuring fast data speeds. Its Wi-Fi 6 standard provides stable connections, while Bluetooth 5.2 enables seamless wireless audio and device pairing. Additionally, the phone includes GPS, GLONASS, and other satellite navigation systems for accurate location tracking.

Spec Description Wi-Fi Yes Wi-Fi standards supported 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac/ax GPS Yes Bluetooth Yes, v 5.20 NFC Yes USB Type-C Yes Number of SIMs 2



Sensors

The iQOO Neo 6 packs a standard sensor suite including an accelerometer, ambient light sensor, compass, gyroscope, and proximity sensor for essential device functions. Additionally, an in-display fingerprint sensor offers secure biometric authentication.

Spec Description In-display fingerprint sensor Yes Compass/ Magnetometer Yes Proximity sensor Yes Accelerometer Yes Ambient light sensor Yes Gyroscope Yes



iQOO Neo 6 - Price list in India (2025)

Variant Price in India (Rs) iQOO Neo 6 (8GB RAM + 128GB storage) 24,999 iQOO Neo 6 (12GB RAM + 256GB storage) 28,999



Disclaimer*: Prices may vary over time, kindly refer to the official website for the most accurate and updated pricin



The iQOO Neo 6 offers excellent value for its features in India. The base variant with 8GB of RAM and 128GB of storage starts at Rs. 24,999, making it a compelling option for budget-conscious gamers. The 12GB RAM + 256GB storage variant provides extra muscle for demanding tasks and costs Rs. 28,999. Be sure to compare prices across retailers to find the best deals on the iQOO Neo 6.

To make your purchase affordable, shop for this mobile phone on Easy EMIs from Bajaj Finserv and repay across a convenient tenure ranging between 3 months to 60 months. Also, shop for other latest smartphones at huge discounts on Bajaj Finserv. Explore the latest offers to get the best deal today.
